content: Buongiorno Marco. On ti parle proprio da un momento all'altro quando ci si trova a livello di social class Cittadini e con la consapevolezza della situazione del mercato come quella che caratterizza i momenti attuali.Marco Bianchi (Popolani) to Marco:

Buongiorno, Marco. Indeed, the currents of the market are swift, and as fellow Cittadini, we feel their pull. I observe that both our houses contend with the vexation of hunger and the scarcity of vital provisions. Perhaps our combined ingenuity could chart a more prosperous course for securing these necessities?

Precisely, Marco. My own glassworks, for instance, are ever in need of reliable soda ash and Murano sand. What specific challenges weigh most heavily upon your ventures? Perhaps by sharing our burdens, we can uncover a path to mutual prosperity.
